item.title: The Feature Speed Formula: a flexible approach to scale hyper-parameters of deep neural networks
item.description: New ‘Feature Speed Formula’ predicts & controls deep learning’s hierarchical feature learning by linking hyperparameter tuning to the angle between feature updates and backward pass.
